SELECT n.id,n.name,n.parent_id,n.parent_ids,n.tag,n.source,n.create_time,n.create_by, n.update_time,n.update_by,n.status FROM note_info n WHERE n.create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ( n.id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or n.parent_ids like CONCAT('%','${parentId}','%' ) )
and (text like CONCAT('%','${text}','%' ) or name like CONCAT('%','${text}','%' ))
order by n.name
